sentences.en: Females and cubs clearly derive some benefit from living in groups.
sentences.cn: 雌兽与幼崽显然受益于群居.

sentences.en: If the function is linearly homogeneous it is possible to derive several propositions of interest.
sentences.cn: 若函数是线性齐次的,可以推导出一些令人感兴趣的命题.

sentences.en: It is valid to consider memory the oldest mental skill, from which all others derive.
sentences.cn: 我们有理由认为记忆是最原始的心智技能，所有其他技能都在此基础上衍生出来。

sentences.en: It should not be limited or constrained by any transcendent standards or moral laws that do not derive from politics itself, whether a law of God or some kind of transcendent moral order or code.
sentences.cn: 它不可以被任何超验的准则或道德条律所，限制和束缚，因为那些并非源自于，政治本身，无论那是上帝的法则，还是，某种超验的道德命令或准则。

sentences.en: Medically, we will derive great benefit from this technique.
sentences.cn: 从医学的角度来讲，这一技术将使我们受益匪浅。

sentences.en: Most patients derive enjoyment from leafing through old picture albums.
sentences.cn: 大多数病人都很喜欢翻看旧相册。

sentences.en: Mr Ying is one of those happy people who derive pleasure from helping others.
sentences.cn: 英先生属于那种助人为乐的快活人。

sentences.en: Mr. Ying is one of those happy people who derive pleasure from helping others.
sentences.cn: 英先生是那种助人为乐的快活人。

sentences.en: Nor does scientific knowledge derive straightforwardly from experiments and observations.
sentences.cn: 科学知识也并非简单地从试验和观察中得来。

sentences.en: The name Anastasia is derived from a Greek word meaning "of the resurrection."
sentences.cn: 阿纳斯塔西娅这个名字是从一个意为“复活”的希腊词语衍生而来的。

sentences.en: The two attitudes derive from different historical perspectives.
sentences.cn: 这两种态度产生于不同的历史观点.

sentences.en: These stories derive from his experiences during the Long March.
sentences.cn: 这些故事是根据他在长征中的经历写成的.

sentences.en: These two amino acids derive their carbon skeletons from pyruvate.
sentences.cn: 这两个氨基酸从丙酮酸获得它们的碳架.

sentences.en: This word is derived from Latin.
sentences.cn: 该词源自拉丁语。

sentences.en: To derive the transformation equations , we return to Fig. 14 - 1.
sentences.cn: 为了求出这个变换式, 我们回顾图14 - 1.

sentences.en: We derive now a useful variant of that inequality.
sentences.cn: 我们现在推导这个不等式的另一种有用形式.

sentences.en: We derive our sustenance from the land.
sentences.cn: 我们从土地获取食物.

sentences.en: We derive the important law: opposite charges attract , like charges repel.
sentences.cn: 我们得到的重要定律是: 异电相吸,同电相斥.

sentences.en: We derive the relations between physical and tensor components.
sentences.cn: 我们推导物理分量和张量分量之间的关系式.

sentences.en: We now shall derive the converses of these propositions.
sentences.cn: 现在我们来推导这些命题的逆命题.

words.tran_cn: 得到；推断（derive的过去分词）；由…而来

trans.tran_en: to get something, especially an advantage or a pleasant feeling, from something
If you say that something such as a word or feeling derives or is derived from something else, you mean that it comes from that thing

trans.tran_cn: 取得，得到；追溯…的起源或来由
trans.tran_en: to get something, especially an advantage or a pleasant feeling, from something
to get something, especially an advantage or a pleasant feeling, from something
